resources.string: Enter dimensions in meters for paint calculation
Support Options: Our hotline is available on weekdays from 08:00 to 16:00, ensuring a response within 1 hour. Alternatively, you can contact us via email.
Width and height must not be zero.

Imprint of K.P.v.IT GbR 
Authorized Representatives: [First Name Last Name] 
Location: [Street, Postal Code] Gummersbach 
Contact: Phone: [Phone Number] 
Email: [Email Address]
Ceiling height must be above 0 meters
